entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 35. POP 60%

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 35. POP 60%
